kycRequired.title: Warning
kycRequired.message:
Dear users,

In accordance with legal requirements, all users are required to complete the KYC process on the Mt Pelerin platform before being able to make purchases within our application. Please note that CSM tokens have a whitelist of approved addresses for interaction. Any transaction of these tokens to a non-whitelisted address will fail. We kindly request you to register on Mt Pelerin and complete your KYC, and then contact the CleanSat Mining support team for validation. If you have any questions or encounter any difficulties, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

The CleanSat Mining Team

userCopied.message: Your address have been copied to clipboard.

usersNotFound.title: Error
usersNotFound.message: {{ usersNotFound }} users couldn't be retrieved. Check your RPC or refresh the table.

createOfferInvalid.title: Error
createOfferInvalid.message: You can not create this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is whitelisted and not in locking periode.

buyOfferInvalid.title: Error
buyOfferInvalid.message: You can not buy this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is not in locking periode, you have enough buyer token balance in your wallet to pay the offer.
